text: Pirkko Vilppunen (born 19 May 1934) is a Finnish gymnast. She competed in seven events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Finland Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vyborg
title: Pirkko Vilppunen
